exceptions.tactic: apply Nat.mul_cancel_r with (p := p) in H; auto.

ctx: apply Nat.mul_cancel_r with (p := 1) in H; auto.

original: intros. split. - intros H. apply Nat.mul_cancel_r with (p := p) in H; auto. + apply Nat.one_succ. - intros H. apply Nat.mul_cancel_r with (p := 1) in H; auto. + symmetry. apply Nat.eq_mul_1.
